Name: Zombie Trigger
About the game: is a VR first person shooting game, it supports both Oculus and HTC Vive. In the game you will play as an agent in a Japanese Temple to escape the siege of zombies. The game provide 10 levels，2 different game modes，2 challenging bosses. What is worth mentioning is you can use your helmet to dodge some special attack. We hope you can get some special experience in our game. If you want to have some awesome experience in our game please vote for us!
